text: Don Quixote () is a 1957 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev."Она умела коллекционировать таланты". Умерла худрук "Современника" Галина ВолчекДОН КИХОТ It stars Nikolay Cherkasov, Yuri Tolubeyev, and Serafima Birman. ==Actors== * Nikolay Cherkasov as Don Quixote de la Mancha / Alonso Quixano * Yuri Tolubeyev as Sancho Panza * Serafima Birman as The Housekeeper * Lyudmila Kasyanova as Aldonsa * Svetlana Grigoryeva as The Niece * Vasily Maksimov as The Priest == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian adventure movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1957 adventure movies Category:1957 drama movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies set in Spain Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Don Quixote (1957 movie)
